title: Molecular characteristics of organic matter derived from sulfonated biochar
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00233D, Paper
Zhengfeng Jiang, Chen He, Fei Gao, Quan Shi, Yang Chen, Haimeng Yu, zhimao zhou, Ruoxin Wang
Sulfonated biochar (SBC), as a functional carbon-based material, has attracted widespread attention due to its excellent adsorption properties. The composition of biochar-derived organic matter (B-DOM) is a key factor influencing...
